snippet: The Affordable Care Act will save money for many who buy their own policies.
abstract: Editorial welcomes news that individuals and families who buy health insurance on their own will pay significantly lower premiums next year in New York and many other states; asserts this is most impressive evidence yet that the Affordable Care Act, through its mandates and competition-promoting health insurance exchanges, can hold previously rising premiums in check.
lead_paragraph: The Affordable Care Act will save money for many who buy their own policies.

headline.main: The Good News on Insurance Premiums
headline.print_headline: The Good News on Insurance Premiums

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
